content.content: The 25th week of SourceCred trial payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. Announcement Starting in December, payouts are increasing from 2,500 DAI/week to 5,000 DAI/week  For more details and motivations behind the change, see Increasing SourceCred Payouts. Our expert Technical Analysis (TA) is bullish on contributor output .  Cred_TA_Maker950×580 77.3 KB  SourceCred Funding If you’d like to see SourceCred integrated into the Maker protocol, be sure to vote on the Nov Governance Cycle Bundle. Payouts This week $2,500 worth of DAI was distributed based on Cred scores. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. Top Contributions Below are the top 10 posts created last week, ranked by Cred generated. The 22nd week of SourceCred trial payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. On-chain payouts for October will go out in the next couple days. Also, a reminder that payouts are now only going to those that have opted in to the trial. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. SourceCred Protocol Funding MIP13c3-SP6: SourceCred Funding has been put forward for formal submission in the November governance cycle.  Preliminary discussion of how an integration design might look has started on this SourceCred forum post. Any feedback or ideas appreciated! Payouts This week $2,500 worth of DAI was distributed based on Cred scores. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. Below are the top contributors by DAI earned.  Top Contributions Below are the top 10 posts created last week, ranked by Cred generated. The 21st week of SourceCred trial payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. Also, a reminder that payouts are now only going to those that have opted in to the trial. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. SourceCred Protocol Funding As detailed in MIP13c3-SP6: SourceCred Funding, the Maker-SourceCred working group will be submitting a Declaration of Intent (MIP13) to MKR holders during the November governance cycle. If approved, the SourceCred trial will be extended an additional six months, during which the working group will work with the community to hash out and implement a direct integration with the Maker protocol! Preliminary discussion of how an integration design might look has started on this SourceCred forum post. Any feedback or ideas appreciated! Payouts This week $2,500 worth of DAI was distributed based on Cred scores. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. The 24th week of SourceCred trial payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. Announcement Starting in December, payouts are increasing from 2,500 DAI/week to 5,000 DAI/week!   For more details and motivations behind the change, see Increasing SourceCred Payouts. SourceCred Protocol Funding After passing the inclusion poll with 99.999% voting Yes (woot!),  MIP13c3-SP6: SourceCred Funding has been included in the November MIPs Governance Poll. If the Governance Poll passes, MIP13c3-SP6 will head to an executive vote next week (Nov 23-27th). Be sure to vote! Payouts This week $2,500 worth of DAI was distributed based on Cred scores. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned. Top Contributions Below are the top 10 posts created last week, ranked by Cred generated. hey @s_ben how to add me for the http://makerdao.sourcecred.io ? I submitted the form, anything else should I do or just wait for the review?
Hey @boogaav, sent you a DM from @sourcecred-trial-adm to confirm your ETH address. Just reply to that and you’re in!

The 23rd week of SourceCred trial payouts are here! A hosted instance of SourceCred running on the Maker forum can be found here. For details on opting in, see Opting in to Sourcecred/Wth is SourceCred?. SourceCred Protocol Funding The Declaration of Intent for SourceCred Funding has passed the Inclusion Poll . Thank you to all that voted   image926×128 4.22 KB  If the Declaration passes the Monthly MIP Governance Poll, it will be included in the Executive Vote at the end of the month (Nov 23-27). Some interesting conversation has started on the MIP13c3-SP6: SourceCred Funding post regarding how a SourceCred integration might look. If you have opinions or ideas, don’t hestiate to jump in! Payouts This week $2,500 worth of DAI was distributed based on Cred scores. Navigate to the DAI Accounts tab  of the Maker instance to see your current DAI balance and total DAI earned.
